name: JID - CC
description:
Can you crack the code?

First person to make it to the ending screen get a reward.

If you are caught cheating or modifying the game to gain advantage 

you will be added to the games "WOS" (Wall Of Shame).

In order to win the prize you must send me a video of you finishing it.

You can send me the video here: MisterJIDJID@gmail.com
